attributes.action: Remove ASH's charity status and register them as a lobbying company.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Action on Smoking and Health seems to have extended its remit as a charity by promoting the use of certain pharmaceutical drugs. On their 'quiting smoking' page for 'Health Profesionals' three of the seven links are for NRT drugs. Lobbying by this group and media intrusion is placing a burden on real charities with real issues.
